mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_id, n.notice_title, n.event_id, n.notice_detail, n.notice_date, n.last_update, n.notice_target, t.target_color FROM notices n LEFT JOIN target_types t ON n.notice_target = t.target_name ORDER BY n.last_update DESC
SELECT * FROM notices ORDER BY last_update DESC LIMIT 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notices(notice_title, event_id, notice_detail, notice_date, last_update, notice_target) VALUES (#{noticeTitle}, #{eventId}, #{noticeDetail}, #{noticeDate}, #{lastUpdate}, #{noticeTarget})
mapper.update: UPDATE notices SET notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, event_id = #{eventId}, notice_target = #{noticeDetail}, notice_detail = #{noticeDetail}, notice_date = #{noticeDate}, last_update = #{lastUpdate}, notice_target = #{noticeTarget} WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
